column4: how do i force a package to install if it depends on an OLDER version of a package i already have installed
im trying to install nvidia-glx-dev, it depends on libgl1-mesa-dev, which depends on mesa-common-dev 6.5.1~20060817-0ubuntu3, but i have 6.5.1+cvs20060824
the old version is, but i have a newer version
